name: Shape of You
lyric:
[00:1]J.Fla-Shape of You
[00:10.42]The club isn't the best place to find a lover
[00:12.61]So the bar is where I go
[00:15.36]Me and my friends at the table doing shots
[00:17.57]Drinking fast, and then we talk slow
[00:20.13]And you come over and start up a conversation with just me
[00:22.80]And trust me, I'll give it a chance now
[00:25.23]Take my hand, stop
[00:26.37]Put "Van the Man" on the jukebox
[00:27.83]And then we start to dance
[00:29.47]And now I'm singing like
[00:30.49]Do you know I want your love
[00:32.75]Your love was handmade for somebody like me
[00:36.07]Come on now, follow my lead
[00:37.52]I may be crazy, don't mind me
[00:40.15]Say: "Boy, let's not talk too much
[00:42.67]Grab on my waist and put that body on me"
[00:45.84]Come on now, follow my lead
[00:47.64]Come, come on now, follow my lead
[00:51.46]I'm in love with the shape of you
[00:53.47]We push and pull like a magnet do
[00:56.18]Although my heart is falling too
[00:58.51]I'm in love with your body
[01:01.35]Last night you were in my room
[01:03.61]And now my bed sheets smell like you
[01:05.94]Every day discovering something brand new
[01:08.69]Oh, I'm in love with your body
[01:10.69]Oh-i-oh-i-oh-i-oh-i
[01:13.30]Oh, I'm in love with your body
[01:15.72]Oh-i-oh-i-oh-i-oh-i
[01:18.37]Oh, I'm in love with your body
[01:20.73]Oh-i-oh-i-oh-i-oh-i
[01:23.51]Oh, I'm in love with your body
[01:25.56]Every day discovering something brand new
[01:28.27]I'm in love with the shape of you
[01:30.65]One week in we let the story begin
[01:32.46]We're going out on our first date
[01:35.18]But you and me are thrifty
[01:36.46]So go all-you-can-eat
[01:37.91]Fill up your bag, and I fill up a plate
[01:40.02]We talk for hours and hours about the sweet and the sour
[01:42.63]And how your family is doing okay
[01:45.05]And leave and get in a taxi, then kiss in the back seat
[01:47.80]Tell the driver make the radio play
[01:49.57]And now I'm singing like
[01:50.41]Do you know I want your love
[01:52.78]Your love was handmade for somebody like me
[01:56.00]Come on now, follow my lead
[01:57.77]I may be crazy, don't mind me
[02:00.19]Say: "Boy, let's not talk too much
[02:02.70]Grab on my waist and put that body on me"
[02:05.91]Come on now, follow my lead
[02:07.72]Come, come on now, follow my lead
[02:11.38]I'm in love with the shape of you
[02:13.79]We push and pull like a magnet do
[02:16.15]Although my heart is falling too
[02:18.56]I'm in love with your body
[02:21.07]Last night you were in my room
[02:23.69]And now my bed sheets smell like you
[02:25.90]Every day discovering something brand new
[02:28.46]Oh, I'm in love with your body
[02:30.62]Oh-i-oh-i-oh-i-oh-i
[02:33.33]Oh, I'm in love with your body
[02:35.59]Oh-i-oh-i-oh-i-oh-i
[02:38.30]Oh, I'm in love with your body
[02:40.41]Oh-i-oh-i-oh-i-oh-i
[02:43.13]Oh, I'm in love with your body
[02:45.66]Every day discovering something brand new
[02:48.36]I'm in love with the shape of you
[00:10.42]这俱乐部不是个能找到安慰的地方
[00:12.61]所以我们去往酒吧
[00:15.36]我和我朋友们在桌前干着杯
[00:17.57]一饮而尽 再缓缓诉起衷肠
[00:20.13]这时你走过来开始和我搭讪
[00:22.80]你知道我会予以回答
[00:25.23]牵起我手 缓缓停下
[00:26.37]在点唱机里放起Van The Man
[00:27.83]在歌声中我们慢慢起舞
[00:29.47]我轻轻哼着
[00:30.49]你知道我想得到你的爱
[00:32.75]你的爱也只为像我这样的人量身存在
[00:36.07]来吧 就跟着我
[00:37.52]我可能会失去理智 别太在意 就开口对我说
[00:40.15]噢男孩儿 别说太多话
[00:42.67]就搂着我的腰 用身体靠近我
[00:45.84]来吧 就跟着我
[00:47.64]就现在 跟着我来
[00:51.46]我深陷在以你名状的爱里
[00:53.47]如磁铁相吸相斥却互不分离

name: 出山
lyric:
[by:GoodTM]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : 花粥
[00:01.000] 作词 : 花粥
[00:10.43]
[00:11.12]在夜半三更过天桥从来不敢回头看
[00:15.86]白日里是车水马龙此时脚下是忘川
[00:21.30]我独自走过半山腰山间野狗来作伴
[00:25.19]层林尽染百舸流秋风吹过鬼门关
[00:29.81]一瞬三年五载 品粗茶 食淡饭
[00:34.49]六界八荒四海 无人与我来叫板
[00:39.19]人间荒唐古怪 竹林外 有书斋
[00:43.78]匿于此地畅快 偏来者不善善者不来
[00:50.85]是我装模作样在瞎掰
[00:55.18]还是他们本就心怀鬼胎
[00:57.82]有人不知悔改 迷雾中混淆黑白
[01:02.46]在情怀里市侩 旁人不敢来拆穿
[01:07.17]看似时来运转 实则在顶风作案
[01:11.73]待曲终又人散 这一出还有谁在围观
[01:16.79]在凡尘修炼二十载听闻水能滴石穿
[01:21.07]帝王豪杰风云变幻敌不过桑田沧海
[01:25.85]我不关心谁的江山只眷恋两小无猜
[01:30.36]兴风作浪不稀罕只身固守峨眉山
[01:35.14]一瞬三年五载 品粗茶 食淡饭
[01:39.73]六界八荒四海 无人与我来叫板
[01:44.33]人间荒唐古怪 竹林外 有书斋
[01:49.11]匿于此地畅快 偏来者不善善者不来
[01:56.00]是我装模作样在瞎猜
[02:00.39]还是他们本就心怀鬼胎
[02:03.15]有人不知悔改 迷雾中混淆黑白
[02:07.73]在情怀里市侩 旁人不敢来拆穿
[02:12.39]看似时来运转 实则在顶风作案
[02:17.06]待曲终又人散 这一出还有谁在围观
[02:21.82]静悄悄配唠唠叨叨
[02:24.00]随便瞧瞧我凑凑热闹
[02:26.34]客串也别太潦草
[02:28.70]吃的生蚝要蘸个酱料
[02:31.00]悄悄你唠唠叨叨
[02:33.30]随便瞧瞧你凑的热闹
[02:35.68]听到你做个记号
[02:37.84]请装进书包别四处招摇
[02:40.29]有人迷途知返
[02:45.08]便是苦尽甘来
[02:50.00]一瞬三年五载
[02:54.15]这曲终又人散
[03:33.63]
[03:33.95]合作音乐人：王胜男
[03:34.13]音乐制作：BachBeats
[03:34.31]录音师：种旭
[03:34.48]混音／母带处理：钻石狗音乐工作室（北京）
[03:34.82]专辑封面设计：姜小海
[03:35.25]

[02:56.390]Half of my heart is in Havana, ooh-na-na (oh, yeah)

[03:08.360]My heart is in Havana (ayy)

name: The Spectre
lyric:
[00:01.000] 作词 : Alan Walker/Anders Froen/Jesper Borgen/Tommy LaVerdi/Gunnar Greve/Lars Kristian Rosness/Marcus Arnbekk
[00:10.07]Hello, hello
[00:11.87]Can you hear me as I scream your name?
[00:17.52]Hello, hello
[00:19.47]Do you meet me before I fade away?
[00:25.37]
[00:25.54]Is this a place that I call home
[00:29.41]To find what I've become?
[00:32.59]Walk along the path unknown
[00:36.91]We live, we love, we lie
[00:40.02]
[00:40.71]Deep in the dark I don’t need the light
[00:44.22]There is a ghost inside me
[00:47.47]It all belongs to the other side
[00:51.90]We live, we love, we lie
[00:55.85]
[01:25.04]Hello, hello
[01:26.93]Nice to meet you
[01:29.91]Voices inside my head
[01:32.33]Hello, hello
[01:34.34]I believe you
[01:37.26]How can I forget?
[01:39.83]
[01:40.14]Is this a place that I call home
[01:43.79]To find what I've become?
[01:47.42]Walk along the path unknown
[01:51.74]We live, we love, we lie
[01:55.04]
[01:55.68]Deep in the dark I don’t need the light
[01:59.11]There is a ghost inside me
[02:02.44]It all belongs to the other side
[02:06.91]We live, we love, we lie
[02:10.04]
[02:22.54][02:15.65]We live, we love, we lie

name: 起风了
lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : 辣椒-起风了
[00:01.000] 这一路上走走停停
[00:29.813] 顺着少年漂流的痕迹
[00:33.130] 迈出车站的前一刻
[00:36.577] 竟有些犹豫
[00:39.673] 不禁笑这近乡情怯
[00:43.073] 仍无可避免
[00:45.717] 而长野的天
[00:47.066] 依旧那么暖
[00:48.766] 风吹起了从前
[00:51.995] 从前初识这世间
[00:54.312] 万般流连
[00:56.096] 看着天边似在眼前
[00:59.027] 也甘愿赴汤蹈火去走它一遍
[01:04.289] 如今走过这世间
[01:07.316] 万般流连
[01:09.100] 翻过岁月不同侧脸
[01:12.262] 措不及防闯入你的笑颜
[01:18.422] 我曾难自拔于世界之大
[01:22.306] 也沉溺于其中梦话
[01:25.620] 不得真假 不做挣扎 不惧笑话
[01:31.480] 我曾将青春翻涌成她
[01:35.292] 也曾指尖弹出盛夏
[01:38.408] 心之所动 且就随缘去吧
[01:44.694] 逆着光行走 任风吹雨打
[02:02.322] 短短的路走走停停
[02:05.206] 也有了几分的距离
[02:08.334] 不知抚摸的是故事 还是段心情
[02:14.881] 也许期待的不过是 与时间为敌
[02:20.890] 再次看到你
[02:22.222] 微凉晨光里
[02:23.987] 笑的很甜蜜
[02:26.739] 从前初识这世间
[02:29.564] 万般流连
[02:31.500] 看着天边似在眼前
[02:34.326] 也甘愿赴汤蹈火去走它一遍
[02:39.425] 如今走过这世间
[02:42.587] 万般流连
[02:44.405] 翻过岁月不同侧脸
[02:47.442] 措不及防闯入你的笑颜
[02:53.748] 我曾难自拔于世界之大
[02:57.693] 也沉溺于其中梦话
[03:00.944] 不得真假 不做挣扎 不惧笑话
[03:06.805] 我曾将青春翻涌成她
[03:10.565] 也曾指尖弹出盛夏
[03:13.812] 心之所动 且就随缘去吧
[03:46.401] 晚风吹起你鬓间的白发
[03:50.384] 抚平回忆留下的疤
[03:53.544] 你的眼中 明暗交杂 一笑生花
[03:59.360] 暮色遮住你蹒跚的步伐
[04:03.604] 走进床头藏起的画
[04:06.637] 画中的你 低着头说话
[04:12.516] 我仍感叹于世界之大
[04:16.380] 也沉醉于儿时情话
[04:19.542] 不剩真假 不做挣扎 无谓笑话
[04:25.603] 我终将青春还给了她
[04:29.473] 连同指尖弹出的盛夏
[04:33.049] 心之所动 就随风去了
[04:38.939] 以爱之名 你还愿意吗
[04:47.755]
[04:48.940] 吉他： 池窪浩一 (Kouichi Ikekubo)
[04:49.836] 贝斯：小島剛広 (Takehiro Kojima)
[04:50.503] 鼓：吉田佳史 (TRICERATOPS) (Yoshifumi Yoshida(TRICERATOPS))
[04:51.319] 键盘：平畑徹也 (Tetsuya Hirahata)
[04:52.189] 小提琴：須磨和声 (Wasei Suma)
[04:52.801] 弦乐：須磨和声、池窪浩一
[04:53.615]
[04:54.499] 录音工程：玉乃井光紀 (Mitsunori Tamanoi) - studioFine
[04:55.217] 发行公司：Negia Entertainment Inc.
[04:56.032] 特别支持：中村光雄(Mitsuo Nakamura)
[04:58.077]

name: 卡路里（电影《西虹市首富》插曲）
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Akiyama Sayuri
[00:00.672] 作词 : 李聪
[00:02.17]编曲：彭飞
[00:02.31]
[00:14.66]孟美岐：
[00:17.56]每天起床第一句 先给自己打个气
[00:21.04]吴宣仪：
[00:21.41]每次多吃一粒米 都要说声对不起
[00:24.60]段奥娟：
[00:25.02]魔镜魔镜看看我 我的锁骨在哪里

[00:35.76]Pose pose

[00:42.76]赖美云：

[00:46.47]傅菁：

name: Let It Go
lyric:
[00:14.340]The snow glows white on the mountain tonight
[00:17.500]Not a footprint to be seen
[00:21.400]A kingdom of isolation and it looks like I'm the Queen
[00:28.760]The wind is howling like the swirling storm inside
[00:35.840]Couldn't keep it in, heaven knows I tried
[00:42.840]Don't let them in, don't let them see
[00:46.250]Be the good girl
[00:47.470]You always had to be
[00:49.780]Conceal, don't feel
[00:51.370]Don't let them know
[00:55.990]Well, now they know
[00:59.440]Let it go
[01:01.110]Let it go
[01:03.050]Can't hold it back anymore
[01:06.490]Let it go
[01:08.200]Let it go
[01:09.900]Turn away and slam the door
[01:13.910]I don't care
[01:16.570]What they're going to say
[01:20.530]Let the storm rage on
[01:24.540]The cold never bothered me anyway
[01:31.830]It's funny how some distance
[01:34.690]Makes everything seem small
[01:38.650]And the fears that once controlled me
[01:41.570]Can't get to me at all
[01:45.860]It's time to see what I can do
[01:49.540]To test the limits and break through
[01:52.900]No right, no wrong, no rules for me
[01:57.150]I'm free
[02:00.810]Let it go
[02:02.300]Let it go
[02:04.180]I am one with the wind and sky
[02:07.670]Let it go
[02:09.240]Let it go
[02:11.200]You'll never see me cry
[02:15.280]Here I stand
[02:18.430]And here I stay
[02:21.960]Let the storm rage on
[02:33.420]My power flurries through the air into the ground
[02:40.340]My soul is spiraling in frozen fractals all around
[02:47.410]And one thought crystallizes like an icy blast
[02:54.180]I'm never going back
[02:57.010]The past is in the past
[03:02.020]Let it go
[03:03.730]Let it go
[03:05.550]And I'll rise like the break of dawn
[03:09.030]Let it go
[03:10.770]Let it go
[03:12.730]That perfect girl is gone
[03:16.620]Here I stand in the light of day
[03:24.960]Let the storm rage on
[03:30.700]The cold never bothered me anyway
